QuestData.Title: The Enigmatic Frost Nymphs
QuestData.Description: When we first scouted locations for the fort, we encountered hostile creatures at two of the glades here in the north. When we passed the snow-covered one directly south of the town, the dryads there watched us with interest, but did not attack.$B$BWe were tired and worn down by the weather. They could've easily killed several of our men, but they didn't.$B$BPerhaps, in reaching out to them, we might discover unexpected allies. Are you willing to travel to the Frozen Glade and make contact with them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lurielle at the Frozen Glade.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lurielle listens as you introduce yourself.>$B$BIt is good to finally meet you, $N. We have long hoped that you and the other newcomers might send representatives. We don't often venture beyond the borders of our glades, especially amid the changes the land is going through.
